changes.rationale: Shifts trust from claims to verifiable observability and emphasizes auditability as a diff...

changes.value: Rebuild hero into a 2-column grid on desktop (60/40): left = H1 + 3-bullet value summary +...
changes.rationale: Improves above-the-fold clarity and scannability while immediately reinforcing control/vis...

changes.value: Use a single dominant primary CTA in hero (full-height button, min 48px) with one secondar...
changes.rationale: Reduces cognitive load and clarifies the conversion path without adding marketing copy.

changes.value: Simplify pricing into 3 tier cards (desktop 3-column, mobile stacked) with one highlighted...
changes.rationale: Makes pricing faster to parse and reduces decision fatigue while preserving detail for eva...

changes.value: Add a proof bar directly under the hero (within 24px): 3–5 compact proof items in a horizo...
changes.rationale: Strengthens trust early and supports the 'ongoing responsibility + visibility' promise wit...

changes.value: Convert How It Works into a numbered 3-step component with a vertical timeline on mobile a...
changes.rationale: Makes the operating model legible and reinforces accountability (who does what) while plac...

changes.value: Merge problem + solution into one section using a 2-column before/after layout on desktop ...
changes.rationale: Improves hierarchy and reduces scanning time by presenting contrast in a single, structure...

changes.value: Reorder to: Hero → Proof bar → Problem/Solution (combined) → How it Works → Visibility/Aud...
changes.rationale: Creates a cleaner narrative: understand → see how → verify control/observability → evaluat...

changes.value: Set max line length for body text to 65ch to enhance readability and maintain focus.
changes.rationale: A well-defined max line length improves clarity and reduces cognitive load.

changes.value: Use a type scale that includes 48px H1, 32px H2, 24px H3, and 16px body with line-height o...
changes.rationale: Creating a clear typographic hierarchy fosters calmness and confidence.

changes.value: Implement primary buttons with 48px height, 16px padding, and a solid color background, wi...
changes.rationale: A strong, consistent button design reinforces user confidence in interactions.

changes.value: Design pricing cards with 16px padding, 8px border-radius, and subtle shadows for a premiu...
changes.rationale: Enhanced card styling creates a more inviting and confident presentation of information.

changes.value: Use 40px vertical spacing between sections to create a clear rhythm and separation between...
changes.rationale: Consistent spacing promotes calmness and helps guide user focus through the content.

changes.value: Add a proof bar directly below the hero section with 3-5 concise proof items for immediate...
changes.rationale: Positioning proof elements early in the layout enhances perceived credibility and safety.

changes.value: Introduce a compact 6-row audit log section with timestamps and event summaries to enhance...
changes.rationale: This provides a visual representation of activity, fostering trust and safety.

changes.value: Select a calming primary color palette, using soft blues and greens for backgrounds and hi...
changes.rationale: Colors influence emotional responses; a calming palette supports a safe-by-default feeling...

issues.description: Hero 2-column grid may push primary CTA below fold on mobile screens <768px
issues.rationale: Critical conversion loss if primary action not immediately visible on mobile traffic

issues.description: Proof bar placement within 24px of hero creates cramped mobile stacking
issues.rationale: Insufficient breathing room degrades mobile scannability and trust comprehension

issues.description: Audit log pattern lacks clear connection to user value proposition
issues.rationale: Technical feature without business context may confuse non-technical visitors

issues.description: Section reordering buries pricing after multiple concept sections
issues.rationale: Delayed pricing exposure increases bounce risk for price-sensitive visitors

issues.description: Combined problem/solution section may create cognitive overload
issues.rationale: Before/after layout forces simultaneous processing of opposing concepts

issues.description: 3-tier pricing cards lack clear upgrade path indicators
issues.rationale: Missing progression cues reduce conversion from lower to higher tiers

issues.description: 48px button height may exceed optimal thumb reach on smaller mobile devices
issues.rationale: Oversized CTAs can reduce tap accuracy and mobile usability

issues.description: 65ch max line length may be too wide for mobile reading comfort
issues.rationale: Optimal mobile line length is 45-55ch for sustained reading

issues.description: 40px section spacing may create excessive scroll distance on mobile
issues.rationale: Large spacing increases scroll fatigue and time to conversion

issues.description: Timeline component on mobile may not convey step progression clearly
issues.rationale: Vertical timelines can appear as disconnected items without clear flow

suggestedFixes.fix: Test hero stacking on mobile: stack vertically with CTA max 320px from top
suggestedFixes.rationale: Ensures primary CTA remains above fold on 375px viewport height

suggestedFixes.fix: Increase proof bar spacing to 48px on mobile, 32px on desktop minimum
suggestedFixes.rationale: Provides adequate breathing room for mobile thumb scanning

suggestedFixes.fix: Add context header: 'Real-time business activity' with 2-line explainer
suggestedFixes.rationale: Bridges technical feature to business value for broader audience

suggestedFixes.fix: Move pricing section before How It Works: Hero → Proof → Problem/Solution → Pricing
suggestedFixes.rationale: Exposes pricing earlier while maintaining logical narrative flow

suggestedFixes.fix: Split into sequential sections with transition element: Problem → Solution bridge
suggestedFixes.rationale: Reduces cognitive load by allowing linear processing of concepts

suggestedFixes.fix: Add 'Most Popular' badge and upgrade arrows between tiers
suggestedFixes.rationale: Provides clear anchoring and progression indicators for tier selection

suggestedFixes.fix: Reduce mobile CTA height to 44px with 12px padding for optimal thumb reach
suggestedFixes.rationale: Maintains accessibility while improving mobile tap accuracy

suggestedFixes.fix: Set responsive max line length: 45ch mobile, 65ch desktop breakpoint
suggestedFixes.rationale: Optimizes reading comfort across device sizes

suggestedFixes.fix: Use responsive spacing: 24px mobile, 40px desktop for section gaps
suggestedFixes.rationale: Reduces mobile scroll distance while maintaining desktop rhythm

suggestedFixes.fix: Add connecting lines and step numbers (1→2→3) with progress indicators
suggestedFixes.rationale: Clarifies step sequence and progression through process
